devdoc.author: Kames Geraghty
devdoc.details: The PodFactory creates/initializes connected Pod and TokenDrop smart contracts. Pods stores tokens, tickets, prizePool and other essential references.

LogCreatedPodAndTokenDrop(address,addres.details: Emitted when a new Pod and TokenDrop pair is created.

constructor.details: Initializes the Pod Factory with an instance of the Pod and TokenDropFactory reference.

params._tokenDropFactory: Target PrizePool for deposits and withdraws

create(address,address,address,address,u.details: The Pod Smart Contact is created and initialized using the PodFactory.

params._decimals: Set the Pod decimals to match the underlying asset.
params._faucet: TokenFaucet address that distributes reward token for PrizePool deposits.
params._manager: Manages the Pod's non-core assets (ERC20 and ERC721 tokens).
params._prizePool: Target PrizePool for deposits and withdraws.
params._ticket: Non-sponsored PrizePool ticket - is verified during initialization.

devdoc.title: PodFactory (ProxyFactory) - Clones a Pod Instance

constructor.notice: Initializes the Pod Factory with an instance of the Pod and TokenDropFactory reference.

create(address,address,address,address,u.notice: Create a new Pod Clone using the Pod instance.

podInstance().notice: Contract template for deploying proxied Pods

userdoc.notice: Reduces gas costs and collectively increases that chances winning for PoolTogether users, while keeping user POOL distributions to users.
